title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 152-1.1 - Applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 152-1.1 - Applications

State Regulations
(a) Applications
for aid under the provisions of section 645
1
of the Education

Law shall be submitted for each funding cycle in a format and timeframe
prescribed by the Commissioner. (b) Each application should include a summer program that occurs on or after July 1
to prepare the student for the academic year. (c) For the purposes of this section a summer
session shall be deemed to occur on or after July 1 to prepare the student for
the academic year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
152-1.1

Amended

New

York State Register September 27, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 39, eff. 9/27/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
